mapper.sql: MASTER.ID AS ID, MASTER.NAME AS NAME, MASTER.CODE AS CODE, MASTER.ACTIVE AS ACTIVE, MASTER.REF_ID AS REF_ID, MASTER.REF_CODE AS REF_CODE, MASTER.VERSION_NO AS VERSION_NO, MASTER.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, MASTER.BEGIN_TIME AS BEGIN_TIME, MASTER.END_TIME AS END_TIME, MASTER.CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME, MASTER.MODIFY_TIME AS MODIFY_TIME, MASTER.CREATE_USER_CODE AS CREATE_USER_CODE, MASTER.MODIFY_USER_CODE AS MODIFY_USER_CODE, MASTER.CREATE_ORG_CODE AS CREATE_ORG_CODE, MASTER.MODIFY_ORG_CODE AS MODIFY_ORG_CODE, MASTER.BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_ID AS BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_ID, MASTER.BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_CODE AS BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_CODE, BLONG.NAME AS BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_NAME

ID AS ID, NAME AS NAME, CODE AS CODE, ACTIVE AS ACTIVE, REF_ID AS REF_ID, REF_CODE AS REF_CODE, VERSION_NO AS VERSION_NO, DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, BEGIN_TIME AS BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME AS END_TIME, CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME AS MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_USER_CODE AS CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE AS MODIFY_USER_CODE, CREATE_ORG_CODE AS CREATE_ORG_CODE, MODIFY_ORG_CODE AS MODIFY_ORG_CODE, BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_ID AS BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_ID, BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_CODE AS BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_CODE
mapper.insert: insert /*综合-价格-插入计价条目*/ into PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_ENTRY (ID, NAME, CODE, ACTIVE, REF_ID, REF_CODE, VERSION_NO, DESCRIPTION, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE, CREATE_ORG_CODE, MODIFY_ORG_CODE,BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_ID,BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_CODE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{refId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blongPricingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blongPricingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_ENTRY /*综合-价格-根据主键修改计费条目*/
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=CHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_USER_CODE = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_ORG_CODE = #{createOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_ORG_CODE = #{modifyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_ID = #{blongPricingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BELONG_PRICE_ENTRY_CODE = #{blongPricingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT /*综合-价格- 计价条目- 查询其他费用*/
FROM PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_ENTRY entry
AND entry.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND entry.REF_CODE = 'VAS' OR entry.CODE = 'FRT'
AND #{receiveDate} >= entry.BEGIN_TIME AND #{receiveDate} < entry.END_TIME
order by entry.VERSION_NO ASC
